actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the United States Postal Service should issue a postage stamp to honor Dr.  Marie Zakrzewska.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate and House of Representatives that the United States Postal Service should issue a postage stamp to honor Doctor Marie Zakrzewska.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the United States Postal Service should issue a postage stamp to honor Dr.  Marie Zakrzewska.
